addons.name: script.common.plugin.cache
addons.news:
[fix] shutdown taking longer than 5 seconds
[fix] ignore encoding issues for socket data
addons.summary: A common caching API for Kodi add-ons.

addons.description: Browse and play video, music and photo media files managed by Plex Media Server.[CR][CR]Fork of PleXBMC by Hippojay
addons.disclaimer: Composite ist KEIN offizielles Plex Add-on und wird von Plex weder unterstützt noch gebilligt.
addons.name: plugin.video.composite_for_plex
addons.news:
[add] Combined Sections to main menu
[add] Composite Playlist to main menu, create a playlist based the information you provide
[add] Composite context menu for library and widgets
    - adds Play Transcoded, Mark as un/watched
[add] Section selection for Kodi Library support
[add] settings to included watched content in combined 'Recently Added Episodes/Movies' sections
[chg] Remove HTTPS from settings and move Certificate Verification from settings to Manage Servers

addons.description: python-twitch for Kodi is module for interaction with the Twitch.tv API based on python-twitch by ingwinlu.

addons.news: [upd] Update material to reflect repository changes
addons.summary: Module for interaction with the Twitch.tv API

addons.name: plugin.video.twitch
addons.news: [rem] remove usage of xbmc.LOGSEVERE, it's being removed in Kodi 19

addons.description: YouTube is one of the biggest video-sharing websites of the world.
